column4: all: are you sure I don't have to "shrink" my c drive on vista before using a live cd of intrepid ibex to be able to run both vista AND ubuntu on my machine?
you have to shrink the partition if it's taking up the whole drive, yes
it can be very small, or big. it's up to you.  it can also be changed later, though it's nice to get it right the first time
